evaluation.feedback: While the speech can be understood mostly, it consists of many repeated phrases and irrelevant information which hinders the coherence of the discourse. The user shows an understanding of basic grammar and a limited vocabulary. Although the pronunciation is comprehensible, the user has not demonstrated the ability to discuss a variety of topics with breadth and depth.
